Description:
I/JS/020322/TBC/02
you have failed to ensure the health, safety and welfare of your emloyees in that you have failed to ensure the local exhaust ventilation (LEV) provided for the control of substances hazardous to health during paint spraying operations has been thoroughly examined and tested at least once every 14 months.

I/JS/020322/TBC/01
you have failed to ensure the health, safety and welfare of your employees in that you have failed to ensure the local exhaust ventilation (LEV) systems provided for the control of substances hazardous to health, namely wood dust, have been thoroughly examined and tested at least once every 14 months.
